name: Corpse
description: An adventurer lies dead in a dungeon hallway, pierced by arrows. The Corpse card embodies decay and corruption.

person: An evil person whose morality has rotted away.
A good person who remains uncorrupted despite being surrounded by wickedness.
creatureTrap: A zombie or similar corporeal Undead whose flesh is decaying, or a trapped corpse.
An Ooze or fungus creature that facilitates the decomposition of corpses.
place: Somewhere things are left to rot, such as a graveyard or charnel house.
A place where fungus grows abundantly on a diet of rotting flesh.
treasure: An art object depicting dead bodies, a corpse just starting to decay, or a magic item that causes decay (such as a Staff of Withering).
A treasure that remains uncorrupted in the midst of rot.
situation: An organization or institution overwhelmed by corruption.
An attempt to corrupt a respected and noble organization.
